law.history: Repealed 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 41, effective June 30, 1986. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 11, effective July 17, 1978.

metadata.lrc-note: Although KRS 157.850 was amended by 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986, it was repealed by 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 41, effective June 30, 1986. Pursuant to KRS 446.100, the repeal prevails.
